title: Wolf Tooth Components Now Come in Ultraviolet Purple
content:
Wolf Tooth Components first introduced Ultraviolet Purple alongside the Waveform Aluminum Pedal launch in 2022, and it’s also been available exclusively on the Ripsaw Aluminum Pedal since last spring. This Ultraviolet Purple is a deep, vibrant purple with tones of ruby and amethyst as the light hits it. As announced this morning, the remainder of Wolf Tooth’s frame components will come in Ultraviolet Purple as a permanent color option.

The parts included in this Ultraviolet catalog drop includes: all headsets, grip collars, seatpost clamps, centerlock rotor lockrings, headset spacers, alloy bar end plugs, ReMote levers, and anything else in the Wolf Tooth Color Shop. It’s a color that can’t help but grab attention on a bike, playing equally well with bright gravel sleds, vintage resto-mods, modern MTBs, and even aero road bikes.

See the full Ultraviolet line at Wolf Tooth.
